ingredients.item: 250g pack essential Waitrose Steak Stir Fry
300g can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
250g pouch Waitrose Microwaveable Whole Grain Rice

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the steak for 2 minutes, add the vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add the chilli powder and then the passata and kidney beans and cook for 2-3 minutes, covered until the broccoli is just tender.
Meanwhile, heat the rice according to the pack instructions and serve with the stir fry.
